/a.js(17,12): error TS2315: Type 'Foo' is not generic.


==== /a.js (2 errors) ====
    /**
     * @template T
     */
    export class Foo {
        /**
         * @constructor
         * @overload
         */
        constructor() { }
    
        /**
         * @param {T} value
                   ~

         */

               ~~~~~~~~~~~
